title: Between 1 October 2017 and 30 September 2018, will an armed group from Bangladesh engage in a campaign that systematically kills 1,000 or more civilians in Bangladesh?
preds: Bangladesh has witnessed increased instability but I don't think the possibility is more than likely.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.

Sporadic killings by the right-wing Islamic terrorist combined with the "Iron-Fist" rule by the current Bangladeshi most probably reach that number. I hope civility dawns first.
